001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
008import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.NavigableMap;
012import java.util.Objects;
013import java.util.Optional;
014import java.util.TreeMap;
015
016/**
017 * Flow assembler that buffers TCP segments per direction and emits in-order byte streams.
018 * <p>Synchronized to support concurrent ingestion per flow; buffering size depends on out-of-order
019 * data retained until gaps close.
020 *
021 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
022 */
023public final class ReorderingFlowAssembler implements FlowAssembler {
024  private final MetricsPort metrics;
025  private final String metricsPrefix;
026  private final Map<DirectionKey, DirectionState> flows = new HashMap<>();
027
028  /**
029   * Creates a reordering assembler.
030   *
031   * @param metrics metrics sink for assembler statistics
032   * @param metricsPrefix prefix used for metric keys; defaults to {@code "flowAssembler"}
033   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code metrics} is {@code null}
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */  public ReorderingFlowAssembler(MetricsPort metrics, String metricsPrefix) {
036    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
037    this.metricsPrefix = (metricsPrefix == null || metricsPrefix.isBlank())
038        ? "flowAssembler"
039        : metricsPrefix;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Accepts a TCP segment, buffering as needed until contiguous bytes become available.
044   *
045   * @param segment segment to assemble; may be {@code null}
046   * @return byte stream slice when contiguous bytes are ready; otherwise empty
047   * @implNote Maintains per-direction buffers and trims duplicates to honour TCP semantics.
048   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
049   */  @Override
050  public synchronized Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) {
051    if (segment == null) {
052      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".nullSegment");
053      return Optional.empty();
054    }
055
056    DirectionKey key = new DirectionKey(segment.flow(), segment.fromClient());
057    DirectionState state =
058        flows.computeIfAbsent(
059            key,
060            k -> new DirectionState(metrics, metricsPrefix, segment.fromClient()));
061
062    Optional<DirectionState.EmittedSlice> emitted = state.onSegment(segment);
063
064    if (segment.fin() || segment.rst() || state.isDrained()) {
065      state.close();
066      flows.remove(key);
067    }
068
069    return emitted.map(slice -> new ByteStream(
070        segment.flow(),
071        segment.fromClient(),
072        slice.data(),
073        slice.timestampMicros()));
074  }
075
076  private record DirectionKey(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {}
077
078  private static final class DirectionState {
079    private final MetricsPort metrics;
080    private final String metricsPrefix;
081    private final NavigableMap<Long, Chunk> buffer = new TreeMap<>();
082
083    private long nextExpected = Long.MIN_VALUE;
084
085    DirectionState(MetricsPort metrics, String metricsPrefix, boolean fromClient) {
086      this.metrics = metrics;
087      this.metricsPrefix = metricsPrefix + (fromClient ? ".client" : ".server");
088    }
089
090    Optional<EmittedSlice> onSegment(TcpSegment segment) {
091      byte[] payload = segment.payload();
092      if (payload.length > 0) {
093        long seq = normalize(segment.sequenceNumber());
094        store(seq, payload, segment.timestampMicros());
095      }
096
097      Optional<EmittedSlice> emitted = emitIfReady();
098      if (emitted.isPresent()) {
099        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".contiguous");
100        metrics.observe(metricsPrefix + ".bytes", emitted.get().data().length);
101      } else if (payload.length > 0) {
102        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".buffered");
103      }
104      return emitted;
105    }
106
107    private void store(long sequenceNumber, byte[] payload, long timestampMicros) {
108      long start = sequenceNumber;
109      if (nextExpected != Long.MIN_VALUE && start + payload.length <= nextExpected) {
110        metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
111        return;
112      }
113      if (nextExpected != Long.MIN_VALUE && start < nextExpected) {
114        int skip = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, nextExpected - start);
115        if (skip >= payload.length) {
116          metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
117          return;
118        }
119        byte[] trimmed = new byte[payload.length - skip];
120        System.arraycopy(payload, skip, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
121        payload = trimmed;
122        start = nextExpected;
123      }
124
125      Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> floor = buffer.floorEntry(start);
126      if (floor != null) {
127        long floorEnd = floor.getKey() + floor.getValue().data().length;
128        if (floorEnd > start) {
129          int overlap = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, floorEnd - start);
130          if (overlap >= payload.length) {
131            metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".duplicate");
132            return;
133          }
134          byte[] trimmed = new byte[payload.length - overlap];
135          System.arraycopy(payload, overlap, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
136          payload = trimmed;
137          start += overlap;
138        }
139      }
140
141      long end = start + payload.length;
142      Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> overlapping = buffer.ceilingEntry(start);
143      while (overlapping != null && overlapping.getKey() < end) {
144        long existingStart = overlapping.getKey();
145        Chunk existing = overlapping.getValue();
146        long existingEnd = existingStart + existing.data().length;
147        buffer.remove(existingStart);
148        if (existingEnd > end) {
149          int tailLen = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, existingEnd - end);
150          byte[] tail = new byte[tailLen];
151          System.arraycopy(existing.data(), existing.data().length - tailLen, tail, 0, tailLen);
152          buffer.put(end, new Chunk(tail, existing.timestampMicros()));
153        }
154        overlapping = buffer.ceilingEntry(start);
155      }
156
157      buffer.put(start, new Chunk(payload.clone(), timestampMicros));
158      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".stored");
159    }
160
161    private Optional<EmittedSlice> emitIfReady() {
162      if (buffer.isEmpty()) {
163        return Optional.empty();
164      }
165      long expected = nextExpected;
166      if (expected == Long.MIN_VALUE) {
167        expected = buffer.firstKey();
168      }
169
170      if (buffer.firstKey() > expected) {
171        nextExpected = expected;
172        return Optional.empty();
173      }
174
175      ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
176      long cursor = expected;
177      long lastTimestamp = 0L;
178
179      while (!buffer.isEmpty()) {
180        Map.Entry<Long, Chunk> entry = buffer.firstEntry();
181        long start = entry.getKey();
182        if (start > cursor) {
183          break;
184        }
185        Chunk chunk = entry.getValue();
186        buffer.pollFirstEntry();
187        byte[] data = chunk.data();
188        if (start < cursor) {
189          int skip = (int) Math.min(Integer.MAX_VALUE, cursor - start);
190          if (skip >= data.length) {
191            continue;
192          }
193          byte[] trimmed = new byte[data.length - skip];
194          System.arraycopy(data, skip, trimmed, 0, trimmed.length);
195          data = trimmed;
196          start = cursor;
197        }
198        out.write(data, 0, data.length);
199        cursor = start + data.length;
200        lastTimestamp = chunk.timestampMicros();
201      }
202
203      if (out.size() == 0) {
204        nextExpected = cursor;
205        return Optional.empty();
206      }
207
208      nextExpected = cursor;
209      return Optional.of(new EmittedSlice(out.toByteArray(), lastTimestamp));
210    }
211
212    boolean isDrained() {
213      return buffer.isEmpty();
214    }
215
216    void close() {
217      buffer.clear();
218    }
219
220    private long normalize(long sequenceNumber) {
221      return sequenceNumber & 0xFFFFFFFFL;
222    }
223
224    private record Chunk(byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
225      Chunk {
226        data = data != null ? data.clone() : new byte[0];
227      }
228    }
229
230    record EmittedSlice(byte[] data, long timestampMicros) {
231      EmittedSlice {
232        data = data != null ? data.clone() : new byte[0];
233      }
234    }
235  }
236}
237
